name: Skwares
body:
# Skwares
## Your bookmarks, reloaded

This is an extension for the Chrome browser. 
If you have more than a few, handling your bookmarks with the built-in manager can be tedious. Who hasn't heaps of unsorted forgotten treasures down that hole ?

Skwares to the rescue !

![Organize your bookmarks](http://i.imgur.com/TnoDItN.png)

And oh, it'd pronounced like "squares", of course, because your bookmarks are now shown as big square icons ;)

## What to do ?

Move the skwares around : group them visually, organize them in a way that makes sense to you. Positions are remembered one session to another. Drop them on another tab to move them in the folders tree. Right-click to edit the tittle or remove the bookmark.

## You like it ? Make it better !

* [Post issues](https://github.com/EricViala/Skwares/issues), blames, praises, pieces of advices, wishes ...
* Enroll as a contributor (see TODO.txt)

## Install
[Stable version](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/skwares/koepapmllfahhfimhhkgfihkjgkndiog?utm_source=chrome-app-launcher-info-dialog) in Google Chrome Webstore.

To run from this GitHub repo, you'll need to grab your own copy of jQuery, jQuery UI and jquery-context-menu and put all the things where they belong, see INSTALL.md

# Help appreciated
As of march 28th 2016, Skwares is usable. However, I'm new to both browser extensions and to GitHub, so any help will be greatly appreciated.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
